org.javalite.common

Class XmlEntities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javalite.common.XmlEntities
  • Deprecated. 
    use Apache Commons or Escape instead

    @Deprecated
public class XmlEntities
extends Object

    Provides XML entity utilities.

    This code was taken from Apache Commons in order to avoid adding a new dependency.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    $Id: Entities.java 911986 2010-02-19 21:19:05Z niallp $
    Author:
    Alexander Day Chaffee, Gary Gregory

      • escape

        public String escape(String str)
        Deprecated. 

        Escapes the characters in a String.

        For example, if you have called addEntity("foo", 0xA1), escape("¡") will return "&foo;"

        Parameters:
        str - The String to escape.
        Returns:
        A new escaped String.

      • escape

        public void escape(StringBuilder sb,
          String str)
        Deprecated. 

        Escapes the characters in the String passed and writes the result to the StringBuilder passed.

        Parameters:
        sb - The StringBuilder to write the results of the escaping to. Assumed to be a non-null value.
        str - The String to escape. Assumed to be a non-null value.
        See Also:
        escape(String), StringBuilder

      • unescape

        public String unescape(String str)
        Deprecated. 

        Unescapes the entities in a String.

        For example, if you have called addEntity("foo", 0xA1), unescape("&foo;") will return "¡"

        Parameters:
        str - The String to escape.
        Returns:
        A new escaped String.

      • unescape

        public void unescape(StringBuilder sb,
            String str)
        Deprecated. 

        Unescapes the escaped entities in the String passed and writes the result to the StringBuilder passed.

        Parameters:
        sb - The StringBuilder to write the results to; assumed to be non-null.
        str - The source String to unescape; assumed to be non-null.
        See Also:
        escape(String), StringBuilder
